sourcesContent:
<script setup>
defineProps({
  
  size: {
    validator(size) {
      return ["sm", "md", "lg"].includes(size);
    },
    default: "md",
  },
  fullWidth: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false,
  },
  disabled: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false,
  },
});
function getClasses( size, fullWidth, disabled) {
  let sizeValue, fullWidthValue, activeValue;

  // Setting the button variant and color
  

  sizeValue = size && `btn-${size}`;

  fullWidthValue = fullWidth && `w-100`;

  activeValue = disabled && `disabled`;

  return `${colorValue} ${sizeValue} ${fullWidthValue} ${activeValue}`;
}
</script>
<template>
  <button
    class="btn"
    :class="getClasses(variant, color, size, fullWidth, disabled)"
  >
    <slot />
  </button>
</template>

<style>

.btn {
  background-color:crimson;
  font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;
}

</style>
